name: Tropical Trifle with Fresh Pineapple
author: RENEEWENA
summary: A refreshing and delicious tropical trifle made from fresh pineapple.
ingredients: 2 (12 ounce) loaves prepared pound cake, crusts trimmed and cut into 1/2-inch squares
directions: Mix custard powder with a few tablespoons cold milk in a bowl
Pour remaining milk into a saucepan, stir in sugar, and bring to a boil over medium heat, about 5 minutes
Add custard mixture to hot milk, stirring continuously until liquid has thickened
Place pineapple in a large heavy pan, cover with water, and bring to a boil over medium heat
Remove from heat and allow to cool, about 30 minutes
Strain the juice and set aside
Place pineapple pieces in a bowl
Mix brown sugar and cinnamon together in a small bowl
Sprinkle over pineapple pieces and toss to coat
Layer 1/2 the pound cake in a trifle bowl
Sprinkle with 1 to 2 tablespoons of the reserved pineapple juice
Spread 1/2 the pineapple pieces over the cake
Spoon 1/2 the cooled custard over pineapple
Spread whipped cream on top and smooth out evenly
Cover and chill in the refrigerator at least 1 hour
